participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and strategic, enjoys intellectual challenges.
participant_1.background: I'm single and with two dogs. I don't drink alcohol. I like to play chess. I am in my thirties.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, enjoys creative expression and gaming.
participant_2.background: On weekends I do live action roleplaying events. I drive a Ford Pinto. I play a lot of Call of Duty. I like donuts. My favorite band is the Insane Clown Posse.
